alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 2:29AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Baldwin, southwestern Escambia, northwestern Santa Rosa and Escambia Counties through 315 AM CST... At 228 AM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Stockton to near Bay Minette to near Spanish Fort. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bay Minette, Atmore, Spanish Fort, Century, Flomaton, Stapleton, Molino, Jay, Pollard, Bratt and I65 And CR 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
